Text.val: SelectAll / UnselectAll alternate labels for same button
04.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
29.08.2011 GB SCR16685 Changed mask of invoice number (10 -> 20)

26.04.2006 AK SCR10924 added pi.HellerOfficeCode and pi.HellerSUBGroupCode
07.09.2004 JJ SCR6804 -Changed delete behaviour to use the "checked" selection

19.02.2004 JJ SCR5556 selection for booking via checkbox
Set active user to virtual for use DBSQL where
Any rows selected.. unselect, else select
Check for existing selections for (Un)select all button label
Single row selected: delete matching oposite amount
DBSQL where blank or current user:

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(abs(MQDT_AMOUNT - INVO_AACTUALI)) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (MQDT_AMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/MQDT, :1/INVO where MQDT_INVO_NO = INVO_NO and MQDT_MQTY_ID = :2 and MQDT_DEPT_CODE = ':3' :4 :5 :7 :8 and MQDT_DEBC_NO = :6 for fetch only
select cast(sum (MQDT_AMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID = :2 and MQDT_DEPT_CODE = ':3' :4 :5 :7 :8 and MQDT_ACTIVEUSER = ':6' for fetch only

Text.val: To prevent problems with deletion of active row by BMQ010 call from GS with virt
